gui.Pyqt5 module

class gui.Pyqt5.EditDialog(title, fields, values, parent=None)[source]

Bases: QDialog

A dialog for editing records whether for students or instructors. :param title: The title of the dialog window :type title: str :param fields: List of fields to be edited :type fields: list[str] :param values: List of current values of the fields :type values: list[str] :param parent: The parent widget of the dialog by default it is set to None :type parent: QWidget, optional

get_values()[source]

Get the edited valuues entered in the dialog. :returns: List of edited values in the same order as fields :rtype: list[str]

class gui.Pyqt5.SchoolManagementSystem[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

This is the main appication window for the School Management System. :ivar db: Database managrement instance used for CURD operations :vartype db:DatabaseManager

add_course()[source]

Add a new course to the database :raises ValueError: If the input data is invalid :raises sqlite3.IntegrityError: If the course ID already exists in the database

add_instructor()[source]

Add a new instructor to the database :raises ValueError: If the input data is invalid :raises sqlite3.IntegrityError: If the instructor ID already exists in the database

add_student()[source]

Add a new student to the database :raises ValueError: If the input data is invalid :raises sqlite3.IntegrityError: If the student ID already exists in the database

backup_database()[source]

Create a backup of the current database.

delete_selected()[source]

Delete the selected record from the display table and database.

edit_selected()[source]

Edit the selected record in the display table.

export_csv()[source]

Export all data to a CSV file.

init_ui()[source]

Initialize the user interface components.

load_data()[source]

Load data from a JSON file into the database.

refresh_table()[source]

Refresh the display table with the latest data from the database.

register_student()[source]

Register a student for a course :raises ValueError: If the input data is invalid

restore_database()[source]

Restore the database from a backup file.

save_data()[source]

Export all data to a JSON file.

search_records()[source]

Search records by name or ID and display results in the search table.

setup_course_tab()[source]

Set up the ‘Courses’ tab UI with input fields and an Add button

setup_display_tab()[source]

Set up the ‘Display All’ tab UI with a table to show all records and Edit/Delete buttons.

setup_instructor_tab()[source]

Set up the ‘Instructors’ tab UI with input fields and an Add button

setup_registration_tab()[source]

Set up the ‘Registration’ tab UI with the Student ID and Course selection fields.

setup_search_tab()[source]

Set up the ‘Search’ tab UI with a search input and a table to show results.

setup_student_tab()[source]

Set up the ‘Studetns’tab UI with input fields and an Add buttons

update_course_and_registration()[source]

Update the course and registration dropdowns with the latest data from the database.

validate_email(email)[source]

Validate email format using a simple regex. :param email: The email address to validate :type email: str :returns: True if email is valid, False otherwise :rtype: bool
